name: OrenRunner
description:
Oren runner is an endless runner where you become a cat and run around the neighborhood while avoiding obstacles

this is group project (6 Day) while i was a game designer and 2d artist, and little bit programming

This game mecanics is inspired from the montaro game, and the for the neighborhood house art is inspired by a space for the unbound game
credit to https://seethingswarm.itch.io/catset for the cat inspiration,  and space for the unbound game for the inspiration

i was trying to make a replica 2d art and only using it for educational purpose
